mail

Class Mail

  • java.lang.Object
    • mail.Mail

  • public class Mail
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the methods to send e-mails
    Author:
    oscar

    • Method Detail

      • sendBudget

        public boolean sendBudget(Budget budget)
        Sends a budget to its Client from its Salesperson. If Salesperson not specifies his e-mail password, sends the email from the default EMAIL.
        Parameters:
        budget - The budget to send by email
        Returns:
        True if it is sent successfully

      • sendNotification

        public boolean sendNotification(User user,
                                Budget budget)
        Sends a notification to a user when an offer is signed, etc
        Parameters:
        user - The user that will receive the email
        budget - The budget that generated the notification
        Returns:
        True if it is sent successfully

      • sendPassword

        public boolean sendPassword(User user,
                            java.lang.String password)
        Sends a new password to a user
        Parameters:
        user - The user that will receive the email
        password - The new password
        Returns:
        True if it is sent successfully

      • sendError

        public boolean sendError(java.lang.String message)
        Sends the error description to ERRORDESTINATION
        Parameters:
        message - The error description
        Returns:
        True if it is sent successfully

      • sendEmail

        private boolean sendEmail(java.lang.String from,
                          java.lang.String fromName,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String to,
                          java.lang.String toName,
                          java.lang.String cc,
                          java.lang.String ccName,
                          java.lang.String subject,
                          java.lang.String title,
                          java.lang.String content,
                          java.io.File attachment)
        Sends the e-mail
        Parameters:
        from - The email of the sender
        fromName - The name of the sender
        password - The password of the email of the sender
        to - The email of the receiver
        toName - The name of the receiver
        cc - The email of the receiver of a copy
        ccName - The name of the receiver of a copy
        subject - The subject of the email
        title - The title of the content of the email
        content - The message of the email
        attachment - A file to attach to the email
        Returns:
        True if it is sent successfully
